decision_conditions: The proposed vehicle crossover at this particular location would result in an adverse impact on highway safety, including pedestrians. The proposal would not comply with the criteria set out in policies and would therefore be contrary to the Development Management Document (2014) Policy DMD46, Core Strategy (2010) Policies 24 and 30 and the Technical Footway Guidance 2013, as well as the aims of the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

Insufficient information has been submitted to demonstrate that the proposed vehicular crossover has maintained sufficient separation from the existing street trees and would therefore compromise the heath, or the subsequent long term survival of the trees, which would significantly undermine the visual amenity of the Bush Hill Park Conservation Area.  The proposals are thereby contrary to Policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), Core Strategy (2010) Policy CP30 and CP31, Development Management Document (2014) Policies DMD44, DMD46 and DMD80, National Planning Policy Framework (2023) and Bush Hill Park Conservation Area Character Appraisal.
